item.description:
My Friend Marc Fuller, formerly of "Bambi Meets Godzilla" and "Living Proof" two legendary local bands, started a new venture called "The Saint, the Sinner & the Judge" They'll be playing and eclectic mix of Rock, Country and Blues. Everything from The Who to James Taylor, Dave Matthews, Jethro Tull, CSN&Y Van Morrison and so much more.

So come on down if you can.

No Cover

I will be across the street at the Rock & Bowl... I will try to come over but I'm hoping that one of you will step up to be event host. I can come over if Sarah stays with a friend after the bowling. Otherwise you'll be on your own. In any case it will be a fun night.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: The Saint, the Sinner & the Judge - Rockin' Band at Buzzards Bay Tavern
